dt: {bc}a procedure used in digital graphics processing for smoothing lines and removing visual distortions

et: {et_link|anti-|anti-} + {et_link|alias:2|alias:2} (in sense "spurious frequency generated during digital processing of an image") + {et_link|-ing:1|-ing:1}
shortdef: a procedure used in digital graphics processing for smoothing lines and removing visual distortions
